article:
Some students don't like cooking, and they _ learn it. Some like it and they learn it from their _ at home.
In our school, students can have cooking _ . So if   our parents are not at home, we don't _ to go to KFCs for meals.
I have great _ in cooking classes. Cooking in class with the _ is interesting. But sometimes things don't go on _ . You know, we must   take food for the lessons from home. It's sometimes not _ to carry it in our schoolbag, because our _ and pencil cases can get dirty. But I don't think it a problem  . It's _ great to learn to make food for our family!
